@FitbitSupport I did all those things and this morning all my data from yesterday was erased again
@FitbitSupport For example yesterday I had 9k steps. I synced my Fitbit and it updated my data. But today it says I took 0 steps yesterday
@FitbitSupport Yes, I have tried all of those things. My Fitbit syncs to my iPad just fine. But then the next day it zeros out all the info
@FitbitSupport My tracker is losing all my previous days. I log a day, it syncs my data and then the next day it is gone.
